description:
Dry your boots, shoes, gloves or mitts fast with this powerful forced air-drying system. The Force Dry DX takes accessory drying to the next level with its whisper-quiet fan driven warm air system. The powerful convection drying process can dry 4 items in as little as 1-hour. An integrated 3-hour timer allows you to have your gear prewarmed and ready to go when you are.

  • Average drying time is 1-2 hours, meaning you could have dry boots, cleats, skates, gloves, etc. over a lunch hour
  • Internal fan circulates warm air throughout your footwear or handwear
  • Multiple accessories are available (not included) that allow you dry your specific gear quickly and efficiently, from headwear to waders
  • Integrated timer (up to 3-hours) lets you have your gear prewarmed for a specific time
  • Heat or no heat button lets you control how the air circulates through your gear
  • 120V AC household outlet, 240 watts
  • Maximum temperature is 40.5° C
  • Dimensions: 30 x 19 x 38cm
name: DryGuy Boot  & Glove Force Dry DX
